name: 8-Bit Battle Royale
description:
This is my Indie Battle Royale game project.

It is inspired by lots of old retro style games in an 8-bit style.

This is currently a short demo for you to play around with the items and controls.

NOTHING IS FINAL!

Controls:

- WASD to move around ( Currently no hold )

- LMB to attack

- E to pickup items

- TAB to open inventory

       COMING SOON

  • Create Map
  • Add more weapons / Items
  • 1V1 PVP
  • Online Multiplayer
  • Steam
  • Optimization
